roleset.name: to separate, break up
roleset.note: PART-V NOTES: Frames file for 'part' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'separate'. (from part.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: part-v: part with, with agentive first party
example.text: [Soviet firms that [*T*-1] hold some]-2 are unwilling [*-2] to part with it , and joint ventures are n't yet allowed [*-3] to participate .

roleset.name: to take or have a part in; participate
roleset.note: PARTAKE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'partake' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. Comparison with 'participate'. (from partake.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: partake-v: transitive
example.text: McDonald 's Corp. said [0] third-quarter earnings rose 14 % on a hefty sales gain , but domestic franchisees apparently did n't partake of the improvement .

roleset.name: take a portion, perhaps as of a meal

example.name: partake-v
example.text: Pastor Glammeyer leads the group in prayer before they partake of a potluck lunch including fried chicken and deviled eggs.
example.arg: of a potluck lunch including fried chicken and deviled eggs
